sentences.sentence: Hop right over the gates for Farmer John's Tumbleweed Farm.
sentences.translation: 在门口，为农夫约翰的坦布尔·韦德的农场合权。

sentences.sentence: Tumbleweed wish everyone a wonderful Year of the Tiger! Happy everyday!
sentences.translation: 风滚草乐队祝大家虎年行大运，万事如意，心想事成！

sentences.sentence: His Tumbleweed Tiny house company sells small ready-made houses as well as plans for slightly larger ones.
sentences.translation: 他的“风滚草小房”公司出售现成的小房子和稍大房子的设计规划。
